name: halo

scripts.build:win: rmdir /s /q build dist && tsup && xcopy /s /y /I build\*.d.ts dist\ && xcopy /s /y /I build\*.d.mts dist\ && xcopy /s /y /I build\*.d.cts dist\ && javascript-obfuscator build --output dist --rename-globals false
scripts.build:linux: rm -rf build && tsup && cp -r build/*.d.ts build/*.d.mts build/*.d.cts dist && javascript-obfuscator build --output dist --rename-globals false

author: cocoth
description: Highly Advanced Logical Operator (HALO) is a versatile AI agent designed to assist with various tasks, including web scraping, data analysis, and more. It integrates with multiple AI providers to deliver efficient and intelligent solutions.
